dcterms:description: A dataset for testing tree-to-tree transformations, including various synthetic tree-transform tasks such as a Lisp function interpreter task and several natural-language tasks inspired by semantic parsing and language generation. It is designed to test compositional generalization in structure transformations.
dcterms:title: Basic Sentence Transforms

dcterms:description: A tree transformation task where the source tree represents a template-generated English sentence, and the target tree represents a subset of the source tree formed from a sequence of Lisp car and cdr operations.
dcterms:title: CAR-CDR-SEQ

dcterms:description: Contains syntax trees in active voice and logical form, testing the transformation from active voice into logical form and vice versa.
dcterms:title: Active↔Logical

dcterms:description: Contains syntax trees in passive voice and logical form, testing the transformation from passive voice into logical form and vice versa.
dcterms:title: Passive↔Logical

dcterms:description: Contains input trees in either active or passive voice and output trees in logical form, testing the simultaneous parsing of different types of trees into a shared logical form.
dcterms:title: Active & Passive→Logical
